# Introduction

# Data

```{r}
library(MASS)
data(mcycle)
summary(mcycle)
```

# Main pipeline

```{r}
qrmon <-
  QRMonUnit( setNames( mcycle, c("Time", "Value") ) ) %>% 
  QRMonQuantileRegression( df = 12, degree = 3, quantiles = seq(0.2,0.8,0.2) ) %>% 
  QRMonPlot()
```

# Simulate

```{r}
qrmon <- qrmon %>% QRMonSimulate(100)
ggplot( qrmon %>% QRMonTakeValue() ) +
  geom_point( aes( x = Time, y = Value ), color = "blue" )
```
